metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000212 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Mitigation for HTTPoxy vulnerability

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lighttpd - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
lighttpd-mod-cml - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
lighttpd-mod-magnet - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
lighttpd-mod-mysql-vhost - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
lighttpd-mod-trigger-b4-dl - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
lighttpd-mod-webdav - 1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.35-4ubuntu2.1').
